description.brief: Driver package for the Nao humanoid robot.
description.p: Driver package for the Nao robot, providing access to walking commands, joint angles, and sensor data (odometry, IMU, camera, ...). The most-current version is compatible with the Nao API version 1.6 or newer, connecting to a real or simulated Nao by wrapping Aldebaran Robotics' NaoQI API in Python. This requires the "lib" directory of the Aldebaran SDK to be in your PYTHONPATH environment variable.

package.author: Armin Hornung, Stefan Osswald, Daniel Maier
